summary: Both previously reported issues have been addressed and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Audit export used internal account_id for user_wallet instead of pseudonymized wallet addresses
previous_issues_status.notes: Now extracts wallet fields from metadata and pseudonymizes them before export.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Content-Disposition filename used unsanitized communityId allowing header injection
previous_issues_status.notes: communityId is sanitized before being placed into the filename.
